oversight, technical consulting, and customer relationship management. Skilled in leveraging 
strategic planning and technical knowledge to drive revenue growth, expand market 
penetration, and optimize customer outcomes. Known for bui lding strong client 
relationships, executing territory growth strategies, and consistently achieving financial and 
operational targets.

        habeebthaika@gmail.com |    +971 -508925190, +91 -8056130613  
Profile Snapshot  
A results -driven Account Manager with 10+ years of experience in the oil refining, 
petrochemical, and specialty chemicals industries, with proven expertise in financial 
oversight, technical consulting, and customer relationship management. Skilled in leveraging 
strategic planning and technical knowledge to drive revenue growth, expand market 
penetration, and optimize customer outcomes. Known for bui lding strong client 
relationships, executing territory growth strategies, and consistently achieving financial and 
operational targets.  
Key Skills  
• Account & Relationship Management:  Expert in managing customer relationships with 
key accounts in the Middle East and Africa, focusing on enhancing market penetration 
and account growth through relationship mapping and strategic implementation.  
• Financial & Strategic Planning:  Experience in financial accountability, including 
volume, margin, and receivable targets, with demonstrated success in executing 
customer and territory strategies in alignment with global divisional goals.  
• Technical Proficiency:  Skilled in technical analysis, process simulations, and 
commercial proposal evaluation. Proficient in utilizing CRM, SharePoint, and other tools 
to drive business outcomes.  
• Business Development:  Adept at identifying new business opportunities, implementing 
market positioning, and driving strategic objectives to support growth and profitability.  
• Interpersonal & Communication Skills:  Strong communicator and team leader, 
proficient in delivering impactful presentations, building multidisciplinary team 
relations, and fostering a client -focused approach.  
Professional Experience  (10 yea rs) 
Dorf Ketal Chemicals  
Abu Dhabi, UAE  
Key Account Manager (Technical Consultant & Business Development  – Abu Dhabi, 
Qatar & Egypt ) 
Oct 2019 – Present  (5+ Years)  
• Financial Oversight: Managed the financial responsibility of key oil and gas accounts 
across Abu Dhabi, Qatar, and Egypt, achieving volume, margin, and receivables targets.  
• Strategic Execution: Developed and executed territory strategies aligned with  global 
objectives to maximize product positioning and market penetration.  

• Customer Relations: Established and maintained strong relationships with customer 
technical and operational teams, advising on technical troubleshooting and providing 
consultation to optimize refinery processes.  
• Forecasting & CRM Management: Led sales forecasting, pricing strategies, and CRM tool 
management to support account management activities.  
• Technical Analysis & Support: Evaluated technical and commercial proposals, conducted 
modeling and simulations, and developed commercial terms to address customer -
specific requirements.  
• Training & Presentations: Conducted client training sessions on product applications, 
enhancing knowledge and adoption across key accounts.  
• Safety & Compliance: Implemented safety initiatives, ensuring compliance with Goal Zero 
standards and fostering a safety -focused work environment.  
Previous Role - Product Application Specialist  
Dorf Ketal Chemicals | Sohar, Oman | Jun 2015 – Oct 2019  (5 Yeaes)  
• Supported technical troubleshooting for refinery units, including Crude Unit 
Management and anti -fouling treatments.  
• Conducted process simulations, advised on operational issues, and delivered customer 
training on advanced additive applications for fuel compliance.  
Education  
Bachelor of Technology (Petroleum Refining and Petrochemicals)  
Anna University, Chennai, India  
Graduated with a CGPA of 8.66  
Software & Technical Skills  
Technical Tools: CRM, SharePoint, Plan Visage  
Office: Microsoft Outlook, Word, PowerPoint, Excel  
Languages  
English, Hindi, Tamil, Arabic  
Licenses  
UAE Driving License (Valid till 2027)  
Oman Driving License (Valid till 2026)

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
